kw.name: Get Request Job List And Verify Status Success
Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=jobs, url=http://localhost:8080, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Get On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:8080/jobs path_url=/jobs headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
${resp_jobs} = <Response [200]>

test.name: Test List of Boxs In Job

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=boxs, url=http://localhost:8080, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Get On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:8080/boxs path_url=/boxs headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
${resp_boxs} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.
kw.msg: ${resp_boxs} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: ${boxes} = [{'id': 1, 'code': 111, 'max': 3, 'current': 0}, {'id': 2, 'code': 222, 'max': 2, 'current': 0}]

kw.name: Get From List
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.
kw.msg: ${boxes_id1} = {'id': 1, 'code': 111, 'max': 3, 'current': 0}

kw.name: Get From List
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.
kw.msg: ${boxes_id2} = {'id': 2, 'code': 222, 'max': 2, 'current': 0}

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.
kw.msg: ${box1_string} = {'id': 1, 'code': 111, 'max': 3, 'current': 0}

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.
kw.msg: ${box2_string} = {'id': 2, 'code': 222, 'max': 2, 'current': 0}

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Post Request For Scan Box And Verify Status Success
Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=scan, url=http://localhost:8080, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{data} = { code=111 }

kw.name: Post On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:8080/scan path_url=/scan headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '15', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"code": "111"}'
${resp} = <Response [201]>

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Post Request For Complete Box And Verify Status Success
Create Session

${resp} = <Response [201]>
